patthana17.20:1.1: Abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo naabyākatassa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Tīṇi veditakaṁ kātabbaṁ.)
patthana17.20:2.1: Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana17.20:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
patthana17.20:3.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
patthana17.20:3.1_2: naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana17.20:3.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana17.20:4.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.20:5.1_0: Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
patthana17.20:5.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho
patthana17.20:5.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana17.20:5.1_3: naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:6.1_0: Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
patthana17.20:6.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho
patthana17.20:6.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana17.20:6.1_3: naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:7.1_0: Abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
patthana17.20:7.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho
patthana17.20:7.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana17.20:7.1_3: naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:8.1: Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:9.1: Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana17.20:10.1: Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pannarasa.
